Colour Sort Game Intro

back to main game

Welcome to Colour Sort! In this game you will be given a set of tubes containing coloured blocks in a random order. The goal of the game is to sort them. You can move the top blocks of a tube by clicking anywhere on that tube. When all colours have been sorted you will get an alert that you have won. Try it out!

The game is largely designed to be easy to play without reading instructions so feel free to just go try it. These pages provide explanation for specific behaviour of game mechanics.

  • Splitting and priority
  • Undo buttons
